title: inserting keyword to hive based on keyword matched by flume
body: Im following one of the many twitter analysis tutorials using Hadoop, one of the things that I need to be able to do is have a column with the matched keyword in, for example, flume is configured to stream data from Twitter for the keywords "expo, uk, and liverpool" for example, then I need to be able to have a record stating which keyword the tweet was matched on
